poo

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • poo.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller class processes user requests and synchronizes the model and the view.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kylian GERARD and Eug√©nie SHEKA KASONGO
    See Also:
    Model, View

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void keypadChangingSpeed(char speedIncrementMultiplierSymbol)
      Transmit the information of the movement's speed selected by the user, with the key '+' or '-', to the model. '+': add 1 from speed '-': remove 1 from speed

      Transmit the information of the coordinates of the mouse clicks to the model.

      Transmit the information of the sleep time selected by the user to the model.

      Transmit the information of the trail selected by the user to the model.
